sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import SocialLink from "../../components/SocialLink"; export default function MovieDecs({ item }) { // console.log(item); return (

{item.name}

{item.subname}

{item.rating}/5 ({item.vote} voted)
  • Status {item.status?"Completed":"Trailer"}
  • IMDb {item.imdb}
  • Actor {item.actor.map((actorItem,key)=>{ return {actorItem.name}{key !== item.actor.length-1 ?',':''} })}
  • Genre {item.genre.map((genreItem,key)=>{ return {genreItem.name}{key !== item.genre.length-1 ?',':''} })}
  • Year {item.year}
  • Nation {item.nation.map((nationItem,key)=>{ return {nationItem.name}{key !== item.nation.length-1 ?',':''} })}
{/* Social Link */}
); }
